_comment_local: Local — Claude Desktop on the same machine as RAG API
_comment_remote: Remote — Claude Desktop on another machine, RAG API on khalid@<SERVER_IP>. Uses SSH so the MCP server runs on the server (localhost API calls, no port exposure needed). Requires SSH key auth.
_usage: Copy either 'local' or 'remote' into ~/.config/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json under 'mcpServers'. Replace SERVER_IP with the actual IP.
